reviews.review: Great game. admittedly, i can see why it wouldnt be for everyone, but in my experience the game just gets better and better as time goes on. sometimes good people are hard to find, but if you get lucky or get a group of friends in there are a lot of people here that are a great time to play with. 10/10
If you hate yourself you'll love this game.
gran juego el mejor de todo steam!
